Summary: 2 Bright lighted object appears out of no where
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Shamokin
There were no other sightings in Shamokin on or around September 3rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my Mother were setting on our front porch when out of no where this Bright object appeared to the North of our house it stood in one spot over the Mountain and didn't move and after a minute it got real Dim and was gone before then I seen a reddish light over our City that was off to the North East but much brighter then the first light and it did the same deal It's all so strange it's like they sneak out of no where and are gone before you set your eye's on them
